General.Name: Daqian Ecology & Landscape Co Ltd
General.Description: Daqian Ecology&Environment Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the ecological landscape planning, design, construction, and operation business. The company is also involved in the seedling cultivation and breeding; technology development and service; flower and seedling planting and sales; sculpture production and construction; handicraft production and sales; food business; and cultural tourism business. In addition, it offers ecological technology consulting, catering, and accommodation services. The company was formerly known as Daqian Ecology & Landscape Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Daqian Ecology&Environment Group Co.,Ltd. in January 2018. Daqian Ecology&Environment Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Nanjing, China.
